Key Match Events: Giancarlo Stanton hit a go-ahead homer in the eighth inning
Luke Weaver recovered to get Yuli Gurriel to fly out to end the threat
Aaron Judge went 0 for 4 with a walk, and is now 1 for 11 with only an infield single through three games
Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees will turn to six-time All-Star pitcher Gerrit Cole on Thursday night with a chance to reach the American League Championship Series
The first baseman on that Royals team, Eric Hosmer, was on hand to deliver the first pitch
The crowd included Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed frustration with his performance
The powerful Yankees drew nine walks in the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the first playoff game at the K in 3,268 days
The Royals used four relievers before Kris Bubic took over for the eighth
